item.title: 新兴市场风险利差降至科威德暴涨以来最低水平
item.description: 对世界上一些风险最高国家的垃圾级债务的热捧，使新兴市场的风险溢价降至五年前科维德冲击之前的最低水平。【原文：The craze for junk-rated debt of some of the world’s riskiest countries has sent an emerging-market risk premium to the lowest level since before the Covid shock five years ago.】

item.title: 在南非的美国公司呼吁在特朗普的争论中保持 "头脑冷静
item.description: 南非美国商会负责人表示，与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的不和有可能危及对两国都有利的重要战略关系。【原文：The head of the American Chamber of Commerce in South Africa said a feud with US President Donald Trump risks a strategically important relationship that benefits both nations.】

item.title: 瑞典养老基金 AP2 将所持 Northvolt 股份减记为零
item.description: 根据瑞典国有养老基金 AP2 的年度报告，该基金已经减记了其在破产电池制造商 Northvolt AB 公司的全部股份。【原文：Sweden’s state-owned pension fund AP2 has written down its entire stake in bankrupt battery maker Northvolt AB, according to the fund’s annual report.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称原油产量进一步低于欧佩克+的目标
item.description: 俄罗斯数据显示，1 月份的石油产量进一步低于欧佩克+配额。【原文：Russian data show oil production in January slipped further below the nation’s OPEC+ quota, according to people familiar with the figures.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金看涨美股，买入科技股
item.description: 对冲基金上周成为美股的大买家，在盈利报告强于预期的情况下，一改此前的看跌立场。【原文：Hedge funds emerged as big buyers of US stocks last week, shifting away from a previously bearish stance in the wake of stronger-than-expected earnings reports.】

item.title: 欧洲每桶 100 美元的天然气价格让烧油更有吸引力
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格的飙升使工业用油更具成本效益，从而有可能增加该地区对桶油的需求。【原文：Europe’s soaring gas prices are making it more cost-effective to burn oil for industrial use, potentially boosting the region’s demand for barrels.】

item.title: Saylor's Strategy 在发布亏损后恢复购买比特币
item.description: Strategy 是一家自称为比特币财政公司的公司，不久前还被称为 MicroStrategy 公司，该公司表示在过去七天里收购了 7.422 亿美元的数字资产，恢复了从 10 月下旬开始的每周收购。【原文：Strategy, the self-styled Bitcoin Treasury company that until recently was called MicroStrategy Inc., said it acquired $742.2 million of the digital asset over the past seven days, resuming weekly purchases that began in late October.】

item.title: 贝莱德高收益债券基金成为主动管理 ETF
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正在将其高收益市政债券基金转换为主动管理型 ETF，以期通过提供成本更低、流动性更强的投资工具来增加管理资产。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is converting its high-yield municipal bond fund into an actively-managed ETF in a bid to grow assets under management by providing a lower-cost and more liquid investment vehicle.】

item.title: 特朗普关税重创黄金，南非股市再创新高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新关税承诺刺激金价上涨之际，投资者忽视了美国冻结援助的消息，南非基准股指创下历史新高。【原文：South Africa’s benchmark stock index headed for a record as investors overlooked a US aid freeze amid a rise in gold prices stoked by President Donald Trump’s latest tariff pledge.】

item.title: 匈牙利公司将向亲俄摩尔多瓦地区供应天然气
item.description: 匈牙利总理多林-雷恰尼称，在摩尔多瓦亲俄地区德涅斯特河左岸拒绝欧盟进一步援助后，匈牙利 MET 天然气与能源营销公司将向该地区供应天然气。【原文：Hungary’s MET Gas and Energy Marketing will supply gas to Moldova’s pro-Russian region of Transnistria after the enclave rejected further European Union assistance, according to the nation’s Prime Minister Dorin Recean.】

item.title: Roblox 加入科技公司新基金，保护儿童上网安全
item.description: Alphabet 公司、OpenAI、Roblox 公司和 Discord 发起的一项新倡议筹集了超过 2700 万美元的资金，用于提供免费的开源工具，改善儿童上网安全。【原文：A new initiative from Alphabet Inc., OpenAI, Roblox Corp. and Discord raised more than $27 million to provide free, open-source tools for improving child safety online.】

item.title: 尽管大幅加息，巴西通胀率仍接近 6
item.description: 巴西分析师上调了 12 个月的通胀预期，使其进一步高于央行的目标，尽管上个月决策者将基准利率上调了整整一个百分点，并承诺在 3 月份再次上调相同幅度的利率。【原文：Brazil analysts revised up 12-month inflation expectations to further above the central bank’s goal, even after policymakers increased the benchmark interest rate by a full percentage point last month and pledged another hike of the same magnitude in March.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔债券暴跌，社会党候选人迫使进行决选
item.description: 社会党挑战者路易莎-冈萨雷斯（Luisa González）在本周末的总统选举中表现好于预期，可能迫使总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）在4月13日进行第二轮选举，厄瓜多尔的美元债券因此下跌。【原文：Ecuador’s dollar bonds tumbled after socialist challenger Luisa González did better than forecast in this weekend’s presidential election, likely forcing President Daniel Noboa into an April 13 runoff.】

item.title: 波兰领导人提出削减繁文缛节，令亿万富翁惊喜不已
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）出人意料地要求亿万富翁拉法尔-布若斯卡（Rafal Brzoska）准备削减官僚作风的建议，以此来促进投资和提高企业竞争力。【原文：Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk unexpectedly asked billionaire Rafal Brzoska to prepare proposals to slash bureaucracy as a way of boosting investments and business competitiveness.】

item.title: 南美、非洲和南亚面临美国互惠关税的最大冲击
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统兑现互征关税的承诺，南美、非洲和南亚将面临最大的冲击。【原文：South America, Africa and southern Asia face the greatest shock if President Donald Trump makes good on his pledge for reciprocal tariffs, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚即将卸任的总统辞职以缓和紧张局势
item.description: 罗马尼亚即将卸任的总统在高等法院决定宣布去年令人震惊的选举结果无效、延长其任期后辞职，以化解政治紧张局势。【原文：Romania’s outgoing president resigned in an effort to defuse political tension after a high court decision to annul a shock election result last year extended his tenure in office.】

item.title: 英国国家医疗服务系统的生产率比大流行前低 20
item.description: 与五年前相比，英国国民医疗服务的生产率降低了近 20%，这让人们更加担心工党政府在公共部门投入的额外资金没有得到应有的回报。【原文：Britain’s National Health Service is almost 20% less productive than it was five years ago, adding to concerns that the Labour government is not getting value for the extra money it’s putting into parts of the public sector.】

item.title: 特朗普挥舞关税大棒显示向硬实力转变
item.description: 关税可以，外援不行。如果要总结唐纳德-特朗普总统和他的政府在上任头三周对经济实力及其用途的设想，那么可以说，未来四年将是硬实力而非软实力的四年。【原文：Tariffs yes, foreign aid no. If you wanted to sum up the vision of economic power and its uses that President Donald Trump and his administration have laid out in his first three weeks in office, then it’s fair to say that the next four years are going to be all about hard rather than soft power.】

item.title: 研究显示：印度创纪录的减税政策仅将经济增长提升 20 个基点
item.description: 根据 Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd. 的分析，印度创纪录的减税措施预计只能有限地推动经济增长，因为消费者会利用节省下来的资金减少债务，而政府则会抑制支出。【原文：India’s record tax cuts are expected to give only a limited boost to economic growth as consumers use the savings to cut back on their debt and the government curbs spending, according to an analysis by Motilal Oswal Financial Services Ltd.】

item.title: 狂热 "的市场乐观情绪是投资者的警示信号
item.description: 今年以来，美国股市的乐观情绪一直未见动摇。对一些投资者来说，所有的乐观情绪都表明未来可能会有麻烦。目前悲观的看法是，投资者基本上已经买满了股票，因此已经没有太多的购买力来继续推动价格上涨。一个名为彭博情报市场脉搏指数（Bloomberg Intelligence Market Pulse Index）的指标综合了市场广度、波动性和杠杆率等衡量标准，以创建投资者情绪信号。详情【原文：There’s been little to shake the happy-go-lucky attitude in US stocks this year. To some investors, all that optimism suggests there may be trouble ahead.The pessimist take at the moment is that investors have largely already filled up on stocks, so there’s not a lot of buying power left to keep propelling higher prices. One indicator, known as the Bloomberg Intelligence Market Pulse Index, combines metrics like market breadth, volatility and leverage, to create signals of investor sentiment. Th】

item.title: 黎巴嫩债券反弹，新部长带来重组希望
item.description: 黎巴嫩违约主权债券大涨，因为人们猜测政府主要部长的任命将启动经济改革，并使该国更接近债务重组。【原文：Lebanon’s defaulted sovereign bonds rallied amid speculation the appointment of key government ministers will kickstart economic reforms and bring the country closer to a debt restructuring.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称美国贸易政策带来 "巨大不确定性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，美国的贸易政策正在引发全球经济的重大摩擦。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said US trade policy is triggering major friction for the global economy.】

item.title: 谷歌人工智能主管称 DeepSeek 的成本说法 "夸大其词
item.description: 谷歌 DeepMind 的老板德米斯-哈萨比斯（Demis Hassabis）认为，中国 DeepSeek 花费不到 600 万美元开发人工智能系统的说法 "夸大其词，有点误导"。【原文：The notion that China’s DeepSeek spent under $6 million to develop its artificial intelligence system is “exaggerated and a little bit misleading,” according Google DeepMind boss Demis Hassabis.】
